roleset.name: having a mustache
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT.

example.name: both args
example.text: You get to where it 's supposed to be , and there is just an old white - mustached prospector with a gravelly voice askin how you heard about " The Block Buster "
example.note: this example annotated according the current verb span, as it came up in verb annotation.
